long_description: The formfitting Speck CandyShell Faceplate Case for iPhone(R) 5/5s offers allover protection, safely enclosing your phone in a dual-layer protective case and a screen-protecting faceplate. Drop testing meets or exceeds military standards, which means it was drop tested on a hard surface with phone retaining full functionality and no damage to screen or buttons. Patented dual-layer protection incorporates a sleek hard shell coupled with a shock-absorbing lining and corners. Type away, text away, game away-TrueTap technology bonds the CandyShield faceplate to the touch screen. Faceplate can also be easily removed for cleaning and reuse. Rubberized covers shield volume and power buttons while keeping them fully accessible. The Speck CandyShell Faceplate Case stands up to extreme temperatures, repeated drops and even accidental spills of sugary drinks or greasy suntan lotion.
short_description: The formfitting Speck CandyShell Faceplate Case for iPhone(R) 5/5s offers allover protection, safely enclosing your phone in a dual-layer protective case and a screen-protecting faceplate.
